title: Spotify clone with Vanilla JS
description: Team-built clone of the Spotify app, complete with playlists, artists, albums and music previews.

title: Netflix clone with React
description: This is one of the first projects completed with React: A netflix clone using React, Javascript and Bootstrap. The Omdb API is used to source movie posters and information.

title: Apple Music clone
description: A music app clone made using React, Javascript, Redux and Bootstrap. I used the API Deezer to source music/artists data and songs previews.

title: Weather App
description: A weather app made using React, Javascript and Bootstrap. Provides current weather and updates every three hours for the next five days. Best enjoyed in mobile form.

title: Spotify clone with Vanilla JS
description: This is my first Full Stack project, Camping elicrisi is website designed for the complete management of a campsite, it was developed as a comprehensive exercise in the design, development of a real web app.

title: Family Recipes Book
description: A small, simple recipe book used to digitalize all our family recipes. I'm currently working on integrating the project with a back end.
